Subject: File Location Denylist [QuadPlus]    [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0BpzhT:ref ]

TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000BpzhT:ref

Hello Alin, is there any update on the matter? We are waiting for your response.
Subject: Netwrix Support Ticket #411957 - File Location Denylist [QuadPlus]

TextBody:
Hello,

Thank you for your email.
I have performed a follow-up on this matter and I will add the conclusion below:

Currently it is not possible to configure EPP to work as requested by the customer. Logging all the activities from that location is possible, having file trace for network shares enabled. The customer can also block entirely USB devices, so no files will be transferred, but it can't block files transferred to USB devices from one location and allow from a different one. You can only block entirely that location.
There is no such feature request logged at this time and no such operation is logged for the roadmap.

Best regards,
Alin Anca
 
Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix - DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
CoSoSys Ltd www.endpointprotector.com
